page.title: 15FOOTPATHS AROUND HORTON
page.content: Horton is a very pretty place.There are lots of footpaths which hikers use. The Cotswold Way is a popular footpath which leads from Bath to Chipping Campden. Sometimes the hikers stay in hotels but sometimes they camp. Today we went for a walk up part of the Cotswold Way.We talked about how well you could see the footpath because it had been mown .When we walked along another path the farmer did not keep it clear. When we went for a different walk we went through a field that had poles in it marking where people should walk .One farmer had padlocked his gates because people walk through and forget to shut them.This makes the farmer cross because cows from one field could get into another and ruin his crops.Some farmers put stiles so that you don't have to climb over the gates.
